sentences.en: 'Your modesty is a cover for your overweening conceit,' she said.
sentences.cn: “你表面谦虚，骨子里目中无人。”她说道。

sentences.en: "Your modesty is a cover for your overweening conceit," she said.
sentences.cn: “你表面谦虚，骨子里目中无人。”她说道。

sentences.en: After 90: heaven and on earth, overweening!
sentences.cn: 90后: 天上地下, 唯我独尊!

sentences.en: An overweening public sector has stifled growth in jobs in service industries.
sentences.cn: 自负的公共部门已经妨碍了服务业岗位的增长.

sentences.en: And it is the love of the impertinent and the overweening.
sentences.cn: 这是无礼的粗鲁的人的爱意.

sentences.en: He was overweening and displayed his slight skill before an expert on a public occasion.
sentences.cn: 他目中无人,在大庭广众之下班门弄斧.

sentences.en: In our foreign trade some people are arrogant and overweening, and this is wrong.
sentences.cn: 在对外贸易方面,有些人骄傲,妄自尊大, 这是不对的.

sentences.en: Madge Wildfire , who , among other indications of insanity , had a most overweening opinion of those charms.
sentences.cn: 玛吉虽说疯疯颠颠, 却还特别爱个俊俏.

sentences.en: Namely, anti - rationalism of the Enlightenment and the intellectual elite overweening attitude.
sentences.cn: 即 反 理性主义和知识精英唯我独尊的启蒙心态.

sentences.en: Overweening intellectuals stick up their tails which are longer than that of the Monkey Sun Wu - kung.
sentences.cn: 知识分子把尾巴一翘,比孙行者的尾巴还长.

sentences.en: The overweening enemy will soon learn this to his cost.
sentences.cn: 关于这一点,傲视一切敌人不久就要得到惨痛的教训.

sentences.en: Throughout her life she has hidden her insecurities behind a facade of , at times , overweening self - confidence.
sentences.cn: 在她一生中,她常常靠摆出泰然自若的样子, 来掩饰内心的犹豫不定.

words.tran_cn: 过度紧张的；过度兴奋的；过分劳累的；（文体等）过于考究的
工作过度；把…做过头；使过于激动（overwork的过去式和过去分词）
自负的，过于自信的；过分的

trans.tran_cn: 自负的，过分的，不合理的，惟我独尊
trans.tran_en: too proud and confident – used to show disapproval
